name: OSP Complete Archive
description:
This is a compilation of every game developed by OSP Enr. (previously known as Oracle Software Enr.) You probably played one or two of them during the '90s, got them off of one of those CD shareware compilations or downloaded them off a BBS. Now is your chance to properly add all of these games to your collection!

This complete archive used to be available on CD-ROM for 14.99$, but now they're all yours for less than a fiver!

This not only contains all completed OSP games but also a bunch of prototypes from games that were never finished. Add to that the scanned manuals of every game and you truly have everything OSP! To allow these old DOS games to run on newer Windows computers, the package includes "dosbox", a free open-source MS-DOS emulator.

Thank you for your support.

This pack includes:

  • The Tournament of Zulula
  • Construction Bob in the Bouncing Factory
  • Xyfud Plasfoc's Earth Invasion
  • The Walls of Bratock
  • Flame Storm : The Bratockian Saga Part II
  • Construction Bob Escapes from Hell
  • Champions of Zulula (Regular and Elite Edition)
